A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is a giant middle finger to SW fans.  It destroys and humiliates the greatest sci-fi characters in history.  So many plot holes.  Breaks the lore of the SW universe.  What a disastrous mess.  

Rian Johnson (an arrogant disgrace iconoclast) should be ashamed of himself.  I cannot believe that he and Disney could make a movie that would make me like the original trilogy less\, but they did the impossible.  

I'm done with Star Wars.  RIP.
